Class ColorBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • ColorBar

  • public class ColorBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for drawing a color bar. The colorBar itself is a set of filled-in rectangles that illustrate the range of possible values.

    Provides the following:

    • A renderable colorbar
    • Given that a range for possible variable values has been set, and a variable value, translates this value into an appropriate color

    Version:
    2016-11-10
    Author:
    Andrew H. Fagg

      How much does red change with a change in value; 0 = no change; 1 = value that moves with the statistic

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorBar

        public ColorBar(int x,
                int y,
                int width,
                int height,
                int divisions,
                double redStart,
                double greenStart,
                double blueStart,
                double redScale,
                double greenScale,
                double blueScale)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - Upper-left corner of the colorbar
        y - UL corner of the colorbar
        width - Width of the colorbar
        height - Height of the colorbar
        divisions - Number of divisions to use for the colorbar
        redStart - The value of the red channel when the value is zero
        greenStart - The value of the green channel when the value is zero
        blueStart - The value of the blue channel when the value is zero
        redScale - The degree to which red brightness related to the value (usually 0 or 1)
        greenScale - The degree to which green brightness related to the value (usually 0 or 1)
        blueScale - The degree to which blue brightness related to the value (usually 0 or 1)

        Translate a scaler value into a color based on the defined color model.
        Parameters:
        value - Variable value
        Returns:
        A color that corresponds to the value

        public void setRange(double newMin,
                     double newMax)
        Set the range of the represented by the colorBar
        Parameters:

        newMax - Maximum value
